description:
Vmax turns your WebOS Phone into a Speedometer. Use it to track your bike rides, walks and on your ski run. It even provides a head-up display for the windscreen of your car!

Watch the YouTube Video: www.fabi.me/vmaxvid/

- Windscreen HUD for your car
- Analog and digital style Speedometer
- Full Trip Info inlcuding average and top speed, travelled distance and timers.
- Supports different units (MPH/KPH ...)
- Speed Limit with sound alert and vibration
- Fully customisable displays, speedometer themes and colors

Using the built-in GPS receiver, the app does not need a data connection.
